mods.note: THE BAHREIN PETROLEUM COMPANY LIMITED / A w a 1 i Bahrain Island, Persian Gulf, PA-558 18th January, 1948. His Britannic Majesty f s The Agency, BAHREIN. Political Agent, ROYALTY TICKETS - DECEMBER 1947 Files 075*1 Dear Sir, I enclose herewith two copies of each of the following Royalty Tickets These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run from tanks Nos. 131, 152 and 153 to the Refinery, upon which the Royalty for December 1947 will be computed. I also enclose five extra copies of the Sunanary of Oil Deliveries. In addition to the above, please find enclosed one copy each of the following tickets, vizs These tickets represent the amount of Arabian Crude Oil run from tanks Nos. 132, 133, 134 and 143* B-482 to B-503-1 (inclusive) A-llll-2 to A-1152-1 (inclusive) Yours very truly K. M. BKUWN CHIEF LOCAL REPRESENTATIVE THE BAHREIN PETROLEUM COMPANY LIMITED Attach:form B.P. 13. The Secretary to the Hon’ble the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bahrain . and has the honour to send him a copy of the undermentioned document. Political Agency, The 20th January, 1948. Dear Sir, ROYALTY TICKETS - FEBRUARY 1948 Files 075.1 I enclose herewith two copies of each of the following Royalty Tickets B-519 to B-541-1 (inclusive) These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run from tanks Nos. 131, 152 and 153 to the Refinery, upon which the Royalty for February 1948 will be computed. I also enclose five extra copies of the Summary of Oil Deliveries. In addition to the above, please find enclosed one copy each of the following tickets, vizs A-1191-2 to A-1232-1 (inclusive) These tickets represent the amount of Arabian Crude Oil run from tanks Nos. 132, 133,134 and 143. SOBJECT ROYALTY TICKETS. ,_h^ ^ c ° THE BAHREIN PETROLEUM COMPANY LIMITED Avail, Bahrein Island, Persian Gulf, PA-970 20 th April, 1948 His Britannic Majesty^ Political Agent, The Agency, BAHREIN. ROYALTY TICKETS - MARCH 19ZB File: 075.1 Dear Sir, I enclose herewith two copies of each of the following Royalty Tickets: B-541-2 to B-558-1 (inclusive) ) These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run from tanks Nos.131, 152 and 153 to the Refinery, upon which the Royalty for March 1948 will be computed. I also enclose five extra copies of the Summary of Oil Deliveries. In addition to the above, please find enclosed one copy each of the following tickets, viz: A-1232-2 to 1271-1 (inclusive) These tickets represent the amount of Arabian Crude Oil run from tanks Nos. 132, 133, 134 and 143. ROYALTY TICKETS - APRIL 1948 File: 075.1 Dear Sir, I enclose herewith two copies of each of the following Royalty Tickets:- B-558-2 to B-583-1 (inclusive) These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run from tanks Nos. 131, 152 and 153 to the Refinery, upon which the Royalty for April 1948 will be computed, I also enclose five extra copies of the Summary of Oil Deliveries. In addition to the above, please find enclosed one copy each of the following tickets, viz: A-1271-2 to A-1317-1 (inclusive) These tickets represent the amount of Arabian Crude Oil run from tanks Nos. 132, 133, 134 & 143. Yours very truly, THE BAHREIN PETROLEUM COMPANY LIMITED Attach: GYC.11.45. The Bahrein Petroleum Company Limited Form B.P. 18. SiMiAEY OF OIL DELIVKRD3S FOR APRIL 1943. ROYALTY TICKtCTSthe Bahrein petroleum company limited A w a 1 i, Bahrein Island, Persian Gulf. 23rd June, 1948. His Britannic Majesty^ Political Agent, The Agency, BAHREIN. ROYALTY TICKETS - MAY. 1945 . File No. 075.1 Dear Sir, I enclose herewith two copies of each of the following Royalty Tickets B. 583-2 to B. 607-1 (inclusive) IVO PA-rm. These tickets represent the total amount of crude oil run from tanks, Nos,131> 152 and 153 to the Refinery, upon which the Royalty for May, 1948 will be computed. I also enclose five extra copies of the Summary of Oil Deliveries. In addition to the above, please find enclosed one copy of each of the following tickets, vizi— A. 1317-2 to A. 1366-1 (Inclusive) These tickets represent the amount of Arabian Crude Oil run from tanks Nos. 132, 133, 134 an ^ 143. PA-278 22nd July, 194B 0 His Britannic Majesty^ Political Agent, The Agency, BAHREIN. 5 m n > i ROYALTY TICKETS - JUNE 1948 B File No:075.1 Dear Sir, I enclose herein.th two copies each of the following B-607-2 to B-632-1 (inclusive). These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run from Tanks Nos: 131, 152 and 153 to the Refinery, upon which the Royalty for June 1948 will be computed. I also enclose five extra copies of the Summary of Oil Deliveries. In addition to the above, please find enclosed one copy each of the following tickets viz:- A-1365-2 to A-1417-1 (inclusive). location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 28/5 Royalty Tickets of the Bahrain Petroleum Co. Ltd.'

physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the file are arranged in chronological order. There are some notes at the end of the file, (folios 675-677). The file notes are arranged chronologically and refer to documents within the file; they give brief description of the correspondence with a reference number, which refers back to that correspondence in the file.
The foliation sequence starts at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the back cover with 677; numbering is written in pencil, encircled, and may be found in the top right corner of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file mainly contains copies of Royalty Delivery Tickets showing the amount of oil shipped from December 1947 to June 1948, transmitted by Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO) representatives to the Political Agent at Bahrain.
